announcements.message:
Good Morning Team! First of all I just want to welcome all new members to the group. The markets are opening at 5 pm EST today! 📊 As always we will be posting all of our charts in here before the market opens! 🔥 

 Tonight we will be having our Sunday Market Blitz at 8 pm EST which is a live trading session where we cover all of our technical analysis on 10+ pairs. 🎥

 This is an amazing way to kick off the week and see where each pair could be making their next move. If there are opportunities for entry we will provide them for FREE on this live trading session 💰 

 The link will be dropped in here prior to this session and it will also be on youtube live 🚀 

 If you want to get started with any of our premium services please click below 👑 

 👉🏻  @ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻 

 👉🏻  @ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻 

👉🏻  @ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻

If you aren’t already make sure to join our discord community. Inside of there you can network with other traders 🌍, join our premium services 📈, participate in giveaways 💰 and more!  Here is the link to get started 🔗
 @ForexLeagueMessageBot

The broker that we use is Nash Markets 👑 They offer low spreads and commissions, BTC withdraws/despoits, 1:500 leverage, ECN Accounts, and you can trade forex, crypto, commodities, indices and stocks. If you want help getting set up with them we put together a few videos to help you get started! https://myforexleague.teachable.com/p/broker
Hey Team! Our live trading session will take place at 8 pm EST! Zoom link will be posted in here before. Talk to you guys soon 🔥

Here is the link to our live trading session you can join NOW 🔗 
 <https://us02web.Zoom.us/j/5273214305>

Thank you for joining our live session! Best of luck this week in the markets.Our next free session will be on Wednesday at 8 am est. 

 You can catch the replay from the Sunday Market Blitz on our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaghoaCcEoZih60zap3yH5A  

  If you want any of our premium services including the Lifetime Course Membership, Premium Signals, and Account Management use our sign up bot!

 You can catch the replay from the Sunday Market Blitz on our Youtube Channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCaghoaCcEoZih60zap3yH5A

🚨 🎟  RAFFLE ANNOUNCEMENT 🎟 🚨 

 We are teaming up with Royal Raffles to give away a 34” LG Ultra Wide Curved Monitor. You can win for as little as $10 entry. There are max 50 tickets available and when the tickets are sold out then a winner will be selected.

 Check out the competition site for more details. One lucky winner is going to get this great monitor for as little as $10 🔥 🤯 Good Luck everyone! https://www.royal-raffles.com/product-page/lg-34in-monitor

Good morning Forex League❗ I want to welcome all our new members to the community! Remember, the morning is the best part of the day to get ahead on your daily habits ☀️ The body is rested, the brain is fresh, and the possibilities of the day are endless.

Have an impactful day and if you want to join any of our premium services just click below! 🙏  

 👉🏻  @ForexLeagueMessageBot 👈🏻

Want to chat with members of this telegram join here 🌎 ⬇️

If you are not already inside, make sure you join our free course! 🔥 Here is the link to get started! 🔗  @ForexLeagueMessageBot
If you want account management services you can get more details by going here! ➡️  @ForexLeagueTradeCopierBot

If you want to check out one of our previously done live webinars you can head over to our website and look back on some of the free ones we have done 🔗  https://myforexleague.teachable.com/courses/enrolled/595325

The broker that we use is Nash Markets 🌍  They offer low spreads and commissions, BTC withdraws/despoits, 1:500 leverage, ECN Accounts, and you can trade forex, crypto, commodities, indices and stocks. If you want help getting set up with them we put together a few videos to help you get started! https://myforexleague.teachable.com/p/broker

Hey Team! We are having our only free live trading session of the week tomorrow at 8 am EST. ⏰ A zoom link will be posted here prior to the session and it is completely FREE to join. 

 If you have questions about anything feel free to come through and ask in the chat! As always there will be a $25 giveaway for people who attend 💰 See you for tomorrow’s session! 💯
